name: Bug Well
description:
– Controls –

Mouse Button to shoot

Up/Down Arrows or W/S to move up or down

– Goal –

Try to get as deep as possible (in hopes of getting your ball back) and survive to make the Highscoretable!!

For the best experience and to make use of the highscore system download the Windows version.

We hope you enjoy our first game in a Ludum Dare.

– Credits –

Programming, Music & SFX: Mexx, Juna

Art: Juna

VFX: Mexx

- LD Link - https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/bug-well
